channel.title: ANTI-SYI TUTORIAL - BANS ALL ALLGOFREE BLITZBOTS - Made by scapexscape
channel.description:
[center][font=arial black][size=24pt][b][u]ANTI-SYI/BLITZBOT[/u][/b][/size][/font][/center] [center]I have just made a new script that blocks [u][i][b]ALL[/b][/i][/u] spammers.[/center] [center]This is of course down to your source, Im using GnarlyScapePK[/center] [center][size=8pt][b]CREDITS: Me - 80% 10% - Source Creator 10% Coder of the Blocking Script[/b][/size][/center] [center][b]THIS IS THE ORIGINAL POST - OTHERS WHO WRITE THIS HAVEN'T MADE THIS[/b][/center]
[hr] [hr]
BEFORE YOU START [b]FIND[/b] : [code=java]initialize()[/code]
(NOTE: THIS PART IS ALL DOWN TO YOUR SAVE METHOD, WHICH YOU WILL NEED TO CHECK) [b]Below[/b] that enter this:-
[code=java]savechar();[/code] [b]WHAT THIS DOES IS MAKE THE PLAYER SAVE AS SOON AS THEY LOGIN WITHOUT LOGGING OUT[/b]
[i]As you know the AllGoFree Blitzbot uses numbers in its username. So I thought to myself "How can I block this?"[/i] [i]I used this script that I found:[/i]
[code=java]if(playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("Shit") || playerName.contains("Dam") || playerName.contains("Ass") || playerName.contains("Cock") || playerName.contains("Dick") || playerName.contains("Pussy") || playerName.contains("Nig") || playerName.contains("Homo") || playerName.contains("Fag") || playerName.contains("Suck") || playerName.contains("Wanker") || playerName.contains("Sex") || playerName.contains("Bi") || playerName.contains("Gay") || playerName.contains("Bitch") || playerName.contains("Suk") || playerName.contains("Suc") || playerName.contains("Sukc") || playerName.contains("Fuk") || playerName.contains("Fck") || playerName.contains("Fuck") || playerName.contains("Fu") || playerName.contains("Whore") || playerName.contains("Hoe") || playerName.contains("zapto") || playerName.contains("penis") || playerName.contains("noip") || playerName.contains("cunt") || playerName.contains("kunt") || playerName.contains("hooker") || playerName.contains("baster") || playerName.contains("anal") || playerName.contains("Gey") || playerName.contains("Qweef") || playerName.contains("fux0r") || playerName.contains("Porn") || playerName.contains("P0rn") || playerName.contains("D4m") || playerName.contains("wtf") || playerName.contains("C0ck") || playerName.contains("nutsack") || playerName.contains("masturbat") || playerName.contains("feg") || playerName.contains("kawk") || playerName.contains("piss") || playerName.contains("vagina") || playerName.contains("cum") || playerName.contains("ball") || playerName.contains("h4xor") || playerName.contains("poop") || playerName.contains("h0r") || playerName.contains("butt") || playerName.contains("pimp") || playerName.contains("screw") || playerName.contains("schmuck") || playerName.contains("foreskin") || playerName.contains("nazi") || playerName.contains("kuk") || playerName.contains("dike")[/code]
NOW WE [b]ADD[/b] THE LIST OF NUMBER LIKE SO:-
[code=java]|| playerName.contains("1") || playerName.contains("2") || playerName.contains("3") || playerName.contains("4") || playerName.contains("5") || playerName.contains("6") || playerName.contains("7") || playerName.contains("8") || playerName.contains("9") || playerName.contains("10") || playerName.contains("0")) {[/code] [b]WHAT THIS DOES IS BLOCKS ALL NUMBER IN THE USERNAME[/b]
[b](THIS ALSO DEPENDS ON YOUR SOURCE AND METHODS)[/b] NOW [b]BELOW[/b] THIS ADD:-
[code=java]appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom);[/code]
[b]WHAT THIS WILL DO IS IPBAN THEM AND BECAUSE THEY ARE SAVED WHEN THEY LOGIN THEY GET BANNED INSTANTLY [/b] [b]ONE THING ABOUT THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE SPEED THEY WILL CONNECT YOU WILL HAVE ABOUT 3 GET THROUGH TILL THIS BLOCKS IT.[/b] [hr] [center]ALL I ASK NOW IS THAT YOU DONT CRITICISE IT. BACKUP BEFORE APPLYING THIS FEATURE[/center] [hr] [center][b]THANKS[/b][/center] [center][b]scapexscape[/b][/center]

item.title: ANTI-SYI TUTORIAL - BANS ALL ALLGOFREE BLITZBOTS - Made by scapexscape
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

  1. What if my username is Vince1813, most username’s do contain numbers.
  2. It’s more about other characters (`, ', -, ~, {, })
  3. This isn’t correct, someone on the bot could have the user name “AbcAbc”, and still spam, blocking numbers does nothing…

Read full topic

item.title: ANTI-SYI TUTORIAL - BANS ALL ALLGOFREE BLITZBOTS - Made by scapexscape

item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

[center][font=arial black][size=24pt]ANTI-SYI/BLITZBOT[/size][/font][/center]
[center]I have just made a new script that blocks ALL spammers.[/center]
[center]This is of course down to your source, Im using GnarlyScapePK[/center]
[center][size=8pt]CREDITS: Me - 80% 10% - Source Creator 10% Coder of the Blocking Script[/size][/center]
[center]THIS IS THE ORIGINAL POST - OTHERS WHO WRITE THIS HAVEN’T MADE THIS[/center]

[hr]
[hr]

BEFORE YOU START FIND :

initialize()

(NOTE: THIS PART IS ALL DOWN TO YOUR SAVE METHOD, WHICH YOU WILL NEED TO CHECK) Below that enter this:-

savechar();

WHAT THIS DOES IS MAKE THE PLAYER SAVE AS SOON AS THEY LOGIN WITHOUT LOGGING OUT

As you know the AllGoFree Blitzbot uses numbers in its username.
So I thought to myself “How can I block this?”
I used this script that I found:

if(playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("Shit") || playerName.contains("Dam") || playerName.contains("Ass") || playerName.contains("Cock") || playerName.contains("Dick") || playerName.contains("Pussy") || playerName.contains("Nig") || playerName.contains("Homo") || playerName.contains("Fag") || playerName.contains("Suck") || playerName.contains("Wanker") || playerName.contains("Sex") || playerName.contains("Bi") || playerName.contains("Gay") || playerName.contains("Bitch") || playerName.contains("Suk") || playerName.contains("Suc") || playerName.contains("Sukc") || playerName.contains("Fuk") || playerName.contains("Fck") || playerName.contains("Fuck") || playerName.contains("Fu") || playerName.contains("Whore") || playerName.contains("Hoe") || playerName.contains("zapto") || playerName.contains("penis") || playerName.contains("noip") || playerName.contains("cunt") || playerName.contains("kunt") || playerName.contains("hooker") || playerName.contains("baster") || playerName.contains("anal") || playerName.contains("Gey") || playerName.contains("Qweef") || playerName.contains("fux0r") || playerName.contains("Porn") || playerName.contains("P0rn") || playerName.contains("D4m") || playerName.contains("wtf") || playerName.contains("C0ck") || playerName.contains("nutsack") || playerName.contains("masturbat") || playerName.contains("feg") || playerName.contains("kawk") || playerName.contains("piss") || playerName.contains("vagina") || playerName.contains("cum") || playerName.contains("ball") || playerName.contains("h4xor") || playerName.contains("poop") || playerName.contains("h0r") || playerName.contains("butt") || playerName.contains("pimp") || playerName.contains("screw") || playerName.contains("schmuck") || playerName.contains("foreskin") || playerName.contains("nazi") || playerName.contains("kuk") || playerName.contains("dike")

NOW WE ADD THE LIST OF NUMBER LIKE SO:-

|| playerName.contains("1") || playerName.contains("2") || playerName.contains("3") || playerName.contains("4") || playerName.contains("5") || playerName.contains("6") || playerName.contains("7") || playerName.contains("8") || playerName.contains("9") || playerName.contains("10") || playerName.contains("0")) {

WHAT THIS DOES IS BLOCKS ALL NUMBER IN THE USERNAME

(THIS ALSO DEPENDS ON YOUR SOURCE AND METHODS) NOW BELOW THIS ADD:-

appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom);

WHAT THIS WILL DO IS IPBAN THEM AND BECAUSE THEY ARE SAVED WHEN THEY LOGIN THEY GET BANNED INSTANTLY
ONE THING ABOUT THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE SPEED THEY WILL CONNECT YOU WILL HAVE ABOUT 3 GET THROUGH TILL THIS BLOCKS IT.
[hr]
[center]ALL I ASK NOW IS THAT YOU DONT CRITICISE IT.
BACKUP BEFORE APPLYING THIS FEATURE[/center]
[hr]
[center]THANKS[/center]
[center]scapexscape[/center]
